languages.text: {n}Солдаты гневно набрасываются гурьбой на вопящего Комиссара, утопив его в массе тел, над которой то и дело вздымаются окровавленные кулаки и приклады. Лишь комиссарская фуражка, сорванная кем-то и упавшая к вашим ногам, дает понять — власти Комиссара пришел конец.{/n}

{n}The soldiers swarm the screaming Commissar, burying him under a pile of bodies, out of which blood-stained fists and gun stocks emerge before sinking back in again. The Commissar's cap, torn from its owner's head, flies out of the crowd and lands at your feet — the only confirmation that his reign of treachery is over.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Солдаты гневно набрасываются гурьбой на вопящего Комиссара, утопив его в массе тел, над которой то и дело вздымаются окровавленные кулаки и приклады. Лишь комиссарская фуражка, сорванная кем-то и упавшая к вашим ногам, дает понять — власти Комиссара пришел конец.{/n}

{n}The soldiers swarm the screaming Commissar, burying him under a pile of bodies, out of which blood-stained fists and gun stocks emerge before sinking back in again. The Commissar's cap, torn from its owner's head, flies out of the crowd and lands at your feet — the only confirmation that his reign of treachery is over.{/n}

languages.text: {n}士兵们将尖叫的政委团团围住，用尸体将他活活埋了起来。血迹斑斑的拳头和枪托挣扎着，从尸堆里钻了出来，之后又被塞了进去。政委的帽子被扯了下来，飞出了人群，落在你的脚边。他的统治与背叛已经结束了，这顶帽子便是唯一的证明。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers swarm the screaming Commissar, burying him under a pile of bodies, out of which blood-stained fists and gun stocks emerge before sinking back in again. The Commissar's cap, torn from its owner's head, flies out of the crowd and lands at your feet — the only confirmation that his reign of treachery is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}士兵们将尖叫的政委团团围住，用尸体将他活活埋了起来。血迹斑斑的拳头和枪托挣扎着，从尸堆里钻了出来，之后又被塞了进去。政委的帽子被扯了下来，飞出了人群，落在你的脚边。他的统治与背叛已经结束了，这顶帽子便是唯一的证明。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Soldaten stürmen auf den schreienden Kommissar zu, begraben ihn unter einem Knäuel von Körpern, aus dem immer wieder blutverschmierte Fäuste und Waffenkolben auftauchen, bevor sie wieder hinabsinken. Die Mütze des Kommissars wird ihm vom Kopf gerissen, fliegt aus dem Pulk und landet vor deinen Füßen — die einzige Bestätigung, dass seine verräterische Herrschaft vorüber ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers swarm the screaming Commissar, burying him under a pile of bodies, out of which blood-stained fists and gun stocks emerge before sinking back in again. The Commissar's cap, torn from its owner's head, flies out of the crowd and lands at your feet — the only confirmation that his reign of treachery is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Soldaten stürmen auf den schreienden Kommissar zu, begraben ihn unter einem Knäuel von Körpern, aus dem immer wieder blutverschmierte Fäuste und Waffenkolben auftauchen, bevor sie wieder hinabsinken. Die Mütze des Kommissars wird ihm vom Kopf gerissen, fliegt aus dem Pulk und landet vor deinen Füßen — die einzige Bestätigung, dass seine verräterische Herrschaft vorüber ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les soldats se ruent sur le commissaire qui disparaît très vite sous un amas de corps dont n'émergent que des poings dégoulinants de sang et des crosses de fusil. Arrachée à la tête de son propriétaire, la casquette du commissaire atterrit à vos pieds, signe que son règne basé sur la trahison est enfin terminé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers swarm the screaming Commissar, burying him under a pile of bodies, out of which blood-stained fists and gun stocks emerge before sinking back in again. The Commissar's cap, torn from its owner's head, flies out of the crowd and lands at your feet — the only confirmation that his reign of treachery is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les soldats se ruent sur le commissaire qui disparaît très vite sous un amas de corps dont n'émergent que des poings dégoulinants de sang et des crosses de fusil. Arrachée à la tête de son propriétaire, la casquette du commissaire atterrit à vos pieds, signe que son règne basé sur la trahison est enfin terminé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los soldados se arremolinan en torno al Comisario, sepultándolo bajo un montón de cuerpos de los que ves salir puños y culatas ensangrentados una y otra vez. La gorra del comisario, arrancada de la cabeza de su dueño, sale volando de entre el gentío y cae a tus pies, confirmando que su reino de traición ha terminado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers swarm the screaming Commissar, burying him under a pile of bodies, out of which blood-stained fists and gun stocks emerge before sinking back in again. The Commissar's cap, torn from its owner's head, flies out of the crowd and lands at your feet — the only confirmation that his reign of treachery is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los soldados se arremolinan en torno al Comisario, sepultándolo bajo un montón de cuerpos de los que ves salir puños y culatas ensangrentados una y otra vez. La gorra del comisario, arrancada de la cabeza de su dueño, sale volando de entre el gentío y cae a tus pies, confirmando que su reino de traición ha terminado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}兵士たちは悲鳴を上げるコミッサーに群がり、彼を死体の山の下に埋めた。そこから血に染まった拳と銃床が出てきてはまた沈んでいく。コミッサーの帽子がその頭から引きはがされ、群衆の中から飛び出てあなたの足元に落ちた。彼の裏切りによる支配がここに終わったのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers swarm the screaming Commissar, burying him under a pile of bodies, out of which blood-stained fists and gun stocks emerge before sinking back in again. The Commissar's cap, torn from its owner's head, flies out of the crowd and lands at your feet — the only confirmation that his reign of treachery is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}兵士たちは悲鳴を上げるコミッサーに群がり、彼を死体の山の下に埋めた。そこから血に染まった拳と銃床が出てきてはまた沈んでいく。コミッサーの帽子がその頭から引きはがされ、群衆の中から飛び出てあなたの足元に落ちた。彼の裏切りによる支配がここに終わったのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Askerler; çığlıklar atan Komiser'in etrafını sarıyor, onu bir vücut yığınının altına gömüyorlar. Yığının içinden bazen kanlara bulanmış yumruklar ve silah dipçikleri görünüp hemen geri kayboluyor. Komiser'in başından fırlayan şapkası, ihanet hükümdarlığının sona erdiğini kanıtlar şekilde ayaklarının önüne düşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers swarm the screaming Commissar, burying him under a pile of bodies, out of which blood-stained fists and gun stocks emerge before sinking back in again. The Commissar's cap, torn from its owner's head, flies out of the crowd and lands at your feet — the only confirmation that his reign of treachery is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Askerler, çığlıklar atan Komiser'in etrafını sarıyor, onu bir vücut yığınının altına gömüyorlar. Yığının içinden bazen kanlara bulanmış yumruklar ve silah dipçikleri çıkıyor ancak ardından tekrar içeri giriyorlar. Komiser'in şapkası başından çıkıyor, kalabalığın içinden fırlıyor ve ayaklarının dibinde duruyor. İhanet hükümdarlığının sona erdiğinin elinde kalan tek somut kanıtı da bu oluyor.{/n}
